sentences.text: Telephone and internet voting is available to all registered and most beneficial stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders voting by proxy may use one of the following three options:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BY INTERNET (available for most stockholders) You can vote your shares online at www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need the 16- digit control number on the Notice of Internet Availability or proxy card   BY MAIL (available for all stockholders) You can vote by mail by marking, dating, and signing your proxy card or voting instruction form and returning it in the postage-paid envelope   BY TELEPHONE (available for most stockholders) In the U.S. or Canada, you can vote your shares by calling 1-800-690- 6903

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name by a bank, broker, or other holder of record, the information sent by your holder of record will explain the voting options available to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in street name and you wish to vote them in person at the Annual Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from your holder of record to do so.

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will be counted as present for purposes of determining whether there is a quorum, but will not affect the outcome of any proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if a nominee for director declines or is unable to accept election?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by proxy and unforeseen circumstances make it necessary for the Board to substitute another person for a nominee, the designated proxy will vote your shares for that other person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is my vote confidential?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tabulator, the proxy solicitation agent, and the inspectors of voting must comply with confidentiality guidelines that prohibit disclosure of votes to Deere.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The tabulator of the votes and at least one of the inspectors of voting will be independent of Deere and our officers and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The only time your voting records will be disclosed is
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) as required by law,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) to the inspectors of voting, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) if the election is contested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you write comments on the proxy card you return to Deere, those comments will be reviewed but your vote will remain confidential.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attendance at the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the meeting, you must be a holder of Deere shares as of December 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to expedite your admission process, we encourage you to register for admission before 11:59 p.m. on Tuesday, February 21, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Visiting www.proxyvote.com and following the instructions provided.

sentences.text: You will need the 16-digit control number included on your proxy card, voter instruction form or notice
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the entrance to the meeting, we will verify your registration and request to see a valid form of photo identification, such as a drivers license or passport.

sentences.text: In order to expedite your entry to the meeting, we encourage you to print your admission ticket prior to arriving at the meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Householding Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If two or more stockholders reside at the same address and appear to be members of the same family, we will send single copies of either the Proxy Solicitation Materials or the Notice, as applicable, to that address unless one of the stockholders notifies us that he or she wishes to receive individual copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure reduces printing and distribution costs related to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not rely on householding when we mail dividend checks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Proxy Solicitation Materials were delivered to an address that you share with another stockholder and you prefer to receive separate copies, contact our Stockholder Relations Department at One John Deere Place, Moline, Illinois 61265-8098 or by phone at (309) 765- 4491.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A number of brokerage firms have instituted householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will have their own procedures for stockholders who wish to receive individual copies of the Proxy Solicitation Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I revoke my consent to the householding program?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To revoke your consent to householding, please contact Broadridge Investor Communication Solutions, Inc., either by calling (800) 542- 1061 or by writing to Broadridge, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.

sentences.text: In 2016, our Board amended the companys by-laws to permit a shareholder, or a group of up to 20 shareholders, that has owned at least 3% of our outstanding common stock for at least three years to nominate and include in our proxy statement candidates for our Board, subject to certain requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such notice must meet the other requirements set forth in our by-laws.

sentences.text: Other Proposals and Nominations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to present a proposal at next years annual meeting or if you would like to nominate one or more directors without inclusion in the proxy statement, you must provide written notice to the Corporate Secretary at the address below between October 25, 2017, and November 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may be nominated at the annual meeting of stockholders only by or at the direction of, or authorization by, the Board, or by any stockholder entitled to vote at the meeting who provides the requisite notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of a proposal must include, for each matter: (1) a brief description of the business to be brought before the meeting; (2) the reasons for bringing the matter before the meeting; (3) your name and address; (4) the class and number of Deere shares you own, either beneficially or of record; (5) whether and the extent to which you (or someone on your behalf) have entered into any derivative or other instrument, transaction, agreement, or arrangement with respect to Deeres stock; (6) any material interest you may have in the proposal; and (7) any other information related to you that is required to be disclosed in connection with the solicitation of proxies with respect to such business under federal securities laws then in effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of a nomination must include: (1) your name and address; (2) the name, age, business address, residence address, and principal occupation of the nominee; (3) the class, series, and number of Deere shares that you and the nominee own, either beneficially or of record; (4) whether and the extent to which you or the nominee (or anyone on behalf of either of you) has entered into any derivative or other instrument, transaction, agreement, or arrangement with respect to Deeres stock; (5) a description of all agreements or arrangements between you and the nominee regarding the nomination; (6) the nominees consent to be elected and to serve; (7) a completed certification of director eligibility; and (8) any other information related to you that is required to be disclosed in the solicitation of proxies for election of directors under federal securities laws then in effect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may require any nominee to furnish other information, within reason, that may be needed to determine the nominees eligibility.

sentences.text: Director Independence Categorical Standards of Deere & Company Corporate Governance Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NYSE STANDARDS OF INDEPENDENCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director may not be considered independent if the director does not meet the criteria for independence established by the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director is considered independent under the NYSE criteria if the Board finds that the director has no material relationship with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the NYSE rules, a director will not be considered independent if, within the past three years:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director has been employed by Deere, either directly or through a personal or professional services agreemen
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: an immediate family member of the director was employed by Deere as an executive officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director receives more than $120,000 during any twelve-month period in direct compensation from Deere, other than for service as an interim chairman or CEO and other than director and committee fees and pension or other forms of deferred compensation for prior service (provided such compensation is not contingent in any way on continued service)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: an immediate family member of the director receives more than $120,000 during any twelve-month period in direct compensation from Deere, other than for service as a non-executive employee and other than director and committee fees and pension or other forms of deferred compensation for prior service (provided such compensation is not contingent in any way on continued service)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director was affiliated with or employed by Deeres independent auditor
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: an immediate family member of the director was a partner of Deeres independent auditor, or was affiliated with or employed in a professional capacity by Deeres independent auditor and personally worked on Deeres audit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a Deere executive officer has served on the compensation committee of a company that, at the same time, employed the director or an immediate family member of the director as an executive officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the director is employed, or an immediate family member of a director is employed as an executive officer, of another company and the annual payments to or received from Deere exceed in any of the last three fiscal years the greater of $1 million or 2% of such other companys consolidated gross annual revenues
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in determining the independence of any director who will serve on the Compensation Committee, the Board must consider all factors specifically relevant to determining whether the director has a relationship to Deere which is material to that directors ability to be independent from management in connection with the duties of a Compensation Committee member, including but not limited to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the source of compensation of such director, including any consulting, advisory, or other compensatory fee paid by Deere to such director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether such director is affiliated with Deere or an affiliate of Deere
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 88      DEERE & COMPANY          2017 PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendices Appendix A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CATEGORICAL STANDARDS OF INDEPENDENCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established the following additional categorical standards of independence to assist it in making independence determinations:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Business Relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any payments by Deere to a business employing, or 10% or more owned by, a director or an immediate family member of a director for goods or services, or other contractual arrangements, must be made in the ordinary course of business and on substantially the same terms as those prevailing at the time for comparable transactions with non-affiliated persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following relationships are not considered material relationships that would impair a directors independence:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if a director (or an immediate family member of the director) is an officer of another company that does business with Deere and the annual sales to, or purchases from, Deere during such companys preceding fiscal year are less than one percent of the gross annual revenues of such company
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if a director is a partner of or of counsel to a law firm, the director (or an immediate family member of the director) does not personally perform any legal services for Deere, and the annual fees paid to the firm by Deere during such firms preceding fiscal year do not exceed $100,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if a director is a partner, officer, or employee of an investment bank or consulting firm, the director (or an immediate family member of the director) does not personally perform any investment banking or consulting services for Deere, and the annual fees paid to the firm by Deere during such firms preceding fiscal year do not exceed $100,000
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Relationships with Not-for-Profit Entities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A directors independence will not be considered impaired solely for the reason that the director or an immediate family member is an officer, director, or trustee of a foundation, university, or other not-for-profit organization that receives from Deere or its foundation during any of the prior three fiscal years contributions in an amount not exceeding the greater of $1 million or two percent of the not-for profit organizations aggregate annual charitable receipts during the entitys fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (Any automatic matching of employee charitable contributions by Deere or its foundation is not included in Deeres contributions for this purpose.)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All contributions by Deere in excess of $100,000 to not-for-profit entities with which the director is affiliated shall be reported to the Corporate Governance Committee and may be considered in making independence determinations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of these standards, Deere shall mean Deere & Company and its direct and indirect subsidiaries, and immediate family member shall have the meaning set forth in the NYSE independence rules, as may be amended from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SHORT-TERM INCENTIVE: As described in the CD&A under Short-Term Incentive (STI), Operating Return on Operating Assets (OROA) and Return on Equity (ROE) are the metrics used to measure performance for the STI program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The OROA and ROE calculations for the fiscal year ended October 31, 2016, is summarized as follows.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Equipment Operations OROA calculation excludes the assets from our captive financial services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ROE is based solely on the Financial Services segment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (Millions of $) OROA Calculation for Equipment Operations: Equipment Operations           Agriculture and Turf Operations          Construction and Forestry Operations Operating Profit     $ 1,880    $ 1,700     $ 180 Average Identifiable Assets With Inventories at Standard Cost (1) $13,046 $ 9,671 $ 3,374 OROA With Inventories at Standard Cost (1) 14.4% 17.6% 5.3%   ROE Calculation for Financial Services: Net Income Attributable to Deere & Company $ 468 Average Equity (1) $ 4,488 ROE 10.4%
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) In the event of an acquisition where goodwill exceeds $50 million, goodwill is excluded for two years to allow time for integration of the new business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For STI purposes, Average Identifiable Assets with Inventories at Standard Cost for the fiscal year ended October 31, 2016 was reduced by $46.2 million to reflect the partial year impact on goodwill for an acquisition made during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Average Identifiable Assets with Inventories at LIFO were $11,816, $8,669, and $3,147 for Equipment Operations, Agriculture and Turf Operations and Construction and Forestry Operations, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OROA with Inventories at LIFO and goodwill as reported were 15.9%, 19.6%, and 5.7% for Equipment Operations, Agriculture and Turf and Construction and Forestry, respectively.

sentences.text: MID-TERM INCENTIVE: As described in the CD&A under Mid-Term Incentive (MTI), Shareholder Value Added (SVA) is the metric used to measure performance for the MTI program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The computation of SVA is summarized as follows for the performance period ended October 31, 2016:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (Millions of $) Fiscal Year 2014      Fiscal Year 2015      Fiscal Year 2016 SVA Calculation for Equipment Operations: Operating Profit $ 4,297 $ 2,177 $ 1,880 Average Identifiable Assets       With Inventories at LIFO $ 14,113 $12,491 $ 11,816       With Inventories at Standard Cost $15,493 $13,840 $13,046 Less Estimated Cost of Assets (1) (3) $(1,860) $(1,661) $(1,565) SVA $ 2,437 $ 516 $ 315 SVA Calculation for Financial Services: Net Income Attributable to Deere & Company $ 624 $ 633 $ 468 Operating Profit $ 921 $ 963 $ 709 Average Equity (3) $ 4,575 $ 4,655 $ 4,488 Less Cost of Equity (2) $ (664) $ (705) $ (680) SVA $ 257 $ 258 $ 29 Deere Enterprise SVA     $ 2,694      $ 774     $ 344 Total SVA for Three-Year Performance Period Ending 2016 $ 3,812
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) For purposes of determining SVA, the equipment segments are assessed a pretax cost of assets that, on an annual basis, is generally 12% of the segments average identifiable operating assets during the applicable period with inventory at standard cost (believed to more closely approximate the current cost of inventory and Deeres investment in the asset).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) For SVA, Financial Services is assessed an annual pretax cost of average equity of approximately 15%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) In the event of an acquisition where goodwill exceeds $50 million, goodwill is excluded for two years to allow time for integration of the new business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For MTI purposes, Average Identifiable Assets with Inventories at Standard Cost for the fiscal year ended October 31, 2016 was reduced by $46.2 million to reflect the partial year impact on goodwill for an acquisition made during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There was no adjustment for goodwill for MTI purposes for the fiscal years ended October 31, 2014 or 2015.

sentences.text: Dear Stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is a pleasure to invite you to the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Deere & Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held at 10 A.M.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Central Time on Wednesday, February 22, 2017, at the Deere & Company World Headquarters, One John Deere Place, Moline, Illinois.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enclosed Notice of Meeting and Proxy Statement covers the formal business of the meeting, which includes election of the named directors, two company proposals, including the ratification of the independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal 2017, one stockholder proposal, and any other business that properly comes before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The rules of conduct for the meeting include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No cell phones, cameras, sound equipment, or recording devices may be brought into the auditorium.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. There will be a discussion period at the end of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to present a question or comment, please make your way to a microphone and wait to be recognized, then begin by stating your name, indicating the city and state where you reside, and confirming that you are a stockholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. The Chairman is authorized to impose reasonable time limits on the remarks of individual stockholders and has discretion to rule on any matters that arise during the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Personal grievances or claims are not appropriate subjects for the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Voting results announced at the meeting by the Inspectors of Voting are preliminary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting results will be included in a Form 8-K filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on or around February 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Pagers and similar devices should be silenced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of the 2017 Annual Meeting, the Fiscal 2016 Proxy Statement, Form of Proxy, and the Fiscal 2016 Annual Report are available on Deere's Internet site at www.JohnDeere.com/stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
